content.detailedDescription:
For the past six months or so, i have watched mysterious lights above my house in various formations and locations.  the first time i saw them, i was looking out my kitchen window to the northwest of roswell.  i did not go outside to see at that time but several days later, stood outside my home and counted 12 of them in various locations along the north and west side of town.  i did not have a digital camera or binoculars at the time but have since purchased both.  my camera is not strong enough to get a good picture, but through the binoculars  they each appear similar, but with different features.

with the naked eye, they appear as very bright star shaped lights; much brighter than stars.  through the binoculars, the biggest and brightest one in the east appears as a circle with a white outer rim that looks like sparkling lights, with green beams forming a prism and blue lights in the center.  the ones in the south and west appear as circular, red-orange objects with blue centers that look like electrical circuit going around inside the circle; they are spinning and flashing.  i have seen one or two of these project beams toward the others.  there was one time that i saw one of the objects move very close to another as though they were communicating, then move back to its original position rapidly.

oftentimes, there are only three in the sky in triangle formation - two in the north directly above my house and one in the south over roswell.  i do not hear any noise and in fact, it is eerily quiet when out at night and there is a magnetic feel to the air.  i have become obsessed and had difficulty sleeping since i began watching them, though i don't know if that is related to the actual objects.  i am out several times each night between 12 am and 4 am to see changes and many times, they are gone after seeing them earlier the same night.  sometimes there are only two or three, other times there are at least 12.  what are these things????  they rarely, if ever move while i am watching them and are almost always stationed in the same spot.  they are not satellites because there are too many and there are none listed in orbit over roswell.  i am dying to know if anyone else has seen them and/or taken photos of them.

during cloudy nights it is difficult to see them but occasional clearing exposes one or two.  the frequency and ability to see them in the sky makes me think that i am not the only one seeing these lights, though i have followed sightings here and on the national ufo sighting website and the only thing close was in january from rio rancho, nm.
content.summary: Nightly for past six months 3 to 12 mysterious lights in nw, sw, and se sky

content.detailedDescription:
First of all, i apologize for making this report so late. i just found out of the existence of this website. 

i was made aware to the whole "october 13th" theory through multiple web source, and obviously, i was skeptical. to keep things short, october 13th came and i realized it would all blow over. 

however, as i got on 4chan's paranormal board, i was greeted to thread upon thread of people talking about this streams. so i found a link and hopped in. at first, they seemed like planes, but soon i realized that planes simply wouldn't act like this. planes don't break apart from each other and fly in straight upwards. planes don't stop in mid-flight and drop down 50 feet. 

so, i started snapping screenshots. 

the ones attached are the best available ones i have. 

the long picture shows a very bright light we saw at one point move to the left in the frame, then down slightly, then right back out in a matter of 10 minutes.

simply unbelievable. 

soon, all the lights disappeared into the night, and all we were left with was a still-lively new york city. 

i was watching this cam along at least 40-50 other people.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Watched a cam stream of the nyc skyline, noticed  extremely unusual  and unnatural light behavior.

content.detailedDescription: It zigged zagged across the the and the went away
content.summary: I cant explaine it

content.detailedDescription: I was returning from fishing in the discovery bay, ca area and received a call from my cousing at 8:34 pm. i was driving my truck when my cousing who was also driving called on the cell phone and told me to look at the sky to the north. i looked at the sky and was stunned because of the unusual shapes, brightness and speed of the lights in the sky. i pulled the truck over and stopped to get a better look. i took out my phone too get pictures. i took several pictures but the resolution was poor and i was not satisfied with the shots. we observed two sets of three triangle shaped lights that were in the shape of a triangle for 2 1/2 minutes before one group of three seperated and disappeared , then the other group of three followed and dissappeared. i have never witnessed anything like this before and decided to call 911. i gave them my report. i called my famliy to tell them what i saw because i was so impacted and excited about what i witnessed.
content.summary: Two sets of 3 triangle  lights of a halogen blue-whte color that trailed each other turning in an arcing motion then seperated, one dissapeared then the other disappeared . they were at about the height at which a large airplane flies.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving to go camping to banff i had just stepped out my front door an walked to my car when my mother noticed stunt jets... it didn't take long to realize they weren't jets or air planes but birds flying like military planes in formation (triangular) the whole time. i started recording their flight and did till the top bird i was zoomed on disappeared. the video reveals it descintigrated and jumped at light speed. it strongly suggests it took off at light speed by seeing the red spectrum addherent to space objects moving away from us at the speed of light or faster. this report is a more broken down analysis of the original recording video. you can find more spirit reality at youtube channel mrdanbunes.
content.summary: 3 fly in a military stunt jet an keep perfect formation till they disappear at light speed

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on back porch, noticed a falling star, the star stopped and hovered. started blinking like a strobe light (white). another object to the west shown a brilliant white light, orange/yellow light and then a red light. this object was hovering and spinning showing the three separate lights as it maneuvered. i will be looking tonight for more activity as last night was just another sighting that has been going on for three weeks.
content.summary: Hovering crafts signaling with white, orange and red lights. other objects asending from space to hovering objects.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 11 pm. my girlfriend and i were watching a movie,and she asked me if i would make some pizza rolls. so i put them in the toaster oven and returned to the couch. then i remember feeling like i was intoxicated and someone had me by the arm escorting me to sit down. please note i was not drinking or intoxicated at this time. as i sat down i heard a voice in my mind say something to me. i cant remember now what it was it said to me, but i remember saying something to me. as i answered it i jumped up off the couch looking for whom i was speaking to. there wasn't anyone there except my girlfriend. then i noticed that the pizza rolls were reduced to ash, they looked like pieces of charcoal. but when i touched them they crumbled. i then looked at the clock and it said 3:20. it had been so long that the burnt smell was not detected by my or my girlfriends noses. i then noticed that i had bruises all over me, and small fine cuts everywhere  that had scabbed up. i was feeling pretty strange and i remember going outdoors and looking at the sky for a little while as i smoked a cigarette. wondering what had just happened. there has been other experiences in my life aswell. my first memory ever in my life was just as strange. also there have been things that have happened to me recently. i moved in with a friend in northern maine. i recall reading a book called american science and invention. i fell asleep while reading this book as i often did, and it usually ended up next to me or on the floor. it was around 2 o"clock in the morning when i woke up and i was lying on my back looking down at my television. i was floating maybe 4 to 5 feet off my bed. no blanket. i remember saying loudly what the ****! and i slammed into the bed. it freaked me out so bad that i couldn't do anything but notice  it was really bright outside for a few minutes after this and then it was dark again. i couldn't go back to sleep for the life of me. i'm 26 years old and this sort of thing has been going on my entire life. i share the stories with you only wondering if others have experienced happenings like this. its pretty unbelievable but i swear its the truth to my knowledge. there are a lot of other things that have happened but ill save them for another time.
content.summary: One of the most odd visits ive ever had. its happened before

content.detailedDescription: Was outside looking up, facing north at approx. 1:50 pm to see commercial aircraft using a digital camera.  two white objects appeared and are seen at high altitude (30,000ft or higher) making a vapor trail traveling from west to east that did not dissipate quickly. tracked at 37x zoom seeing two distinct, separate white objects.  first thought that the objects were a commercial aircraft making a strange vapor trail due to the weather conditions.  the two objects were different in size (smaller leading with larger following) with both being rectangular in shape, totally white with black dots along all four edges traveling at normal commercial aircraft speeds and appearance from the ground without the digital camera. the objects disappeared when tracking became too far away to see anything but the vapor trail in the eastern sky.  duration approx. 1 min.
content.summary: Two white objects seen at high altitude (30,000ft or higher) making a vapor trail that did not dissipate while looking through camera at 37x optical. thought it was a commercial aircraft at first.

content.detailedDescription:
8/18/2011

as reported to asd by phone on 8/21/2011: 

the witness and her husband and two children arrived home at 10:00 pm and noticed a strange humming sound.  they got out of the car to investigate the source and saw a group of bright white/orange lights in a v or chevron shape coming into view over their neighbor's tree headed in a north to south direction.  they stated that they could only see bright lights, and no structure or craft.  the lights were mostly a very bright white with a slight orange glow to them.  there were at least four lights on each side of the "v" shape and the lights were directed down, with none facing forward.  there were no flashing lights, and no red, green, or other color lights visible.  the lights moved along in a straight-line path slowly until they went out of sight behind trees.  the humming noise got lower and lower until they could no longer hear it.  the total time the object was in view was approximately 2 minutes.  they couple thought that the lights were flying very low in the sky.  the sound was not like that of a plane engine or anything else they have heard before.  they also stated that the object moved more slowly than a plane would.
content.summary: Large chevron cluster of bright lights moving over independence

content.detailedDescription:
i was parked on a observation lookout spot on skyline road in duluth, mn to check out the view at night.  it overlooks lake superior and duluth.  there was one car in front of me doing the same thing.  
  under five minutes of being there i noticed a solid reddish colored light in front and above eye level.  it was gone after 20 seconds of viewing it.  i thought it was a plane. the clouds were puffy so i thought it disappeared behind one.  about five minutes later, the light was in the same spot.  now i thought for sure this was a plane on it's way to land.  it disappeared again.  i started thinking it could be a ufo and the people in front of me were watching too.  well, they left right about then and i remained looking in the same spot.  within another five minutes it appeared in the same spot and disappeared.  i knew that something was up but i still was thinking airplane landing.  at about twenty minutes in, it flashed for the fourth time.  just after the light vanished i seen a small blue light at eye level come from the left side of my vision.  behind the blue light, two more blue lights followed on the same path.  at this point i thought i was seeing a mother ship so i got out of my car and was calling my friend on the phone.  

i soon realized they were military fighter jets heading towards where the light was flashing when one of the jets rose above the level of the other two.  they went directly towards where the object was and then turned the opposite way, back towards me and then followed the same route back towards the military base. 

the light never came back.  the next day my friend told me that his friends heard the jets fly over duluth at a strange hour in the night.   

this was my first ufo experience.
content.summary: Reddish opb blinking then milatary planes show up.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the back deck at my home with my fiance, we were just outside smoking a cigarette.  i looked past the treeline and said that it looked like someone lit a balloon on fire or something.  as it got closer i couldn't identify it so i went ahead and used my smart phone to film it.  it was originally kind of just a joke.  after i zoomed in thats when i got a little creeped out.  we watched it over and over until we decided to see what others thought.  surprisingly withing 24 hours it had been spread all over the internet.  i contacted the local news (wsil channel 3) that night.  they called the next morning wanting to see the video, so i sent it to them.  i haven't heard back from them.  

i honestly don't know what it is.  everyone keeps saying its a japanese lantern.  all the video of those lanterns that i have researched all seem to go strait up... this is steady and slow.  

it then went off to the other side of the tree line and thats when we lost sight of it.
content.summary: Glowing pulsating orb, slow moving and disappears.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in duluth and have a view of the duluth harbor where i can watch the shipping vessels come into and out of.  i know the difference in the boat sizes and we often have 1000 foot ships.  

i am on the hillside about 300 ft above lake superior and two hundred feet under the famous skyline road in which the tourists love to drive and take in the sights of the lake.   i live in an old school and have giant windows in my old class room turned into living space.  

we had one window open and were smoking cigarettes with our feet out the window looking over the harbor.  it was me and my lady friend. 

a little under eye level a giant dark rectangle appeared from the left side of the harbor view and at about thirty to forty miles per hour we watched it go in a straight line from the left of our view all the way till it went out of sight on the right side of our view.  

the object was well over one thousand feet from side to side and at least one hundred feet top to bottom.  we saw it from just about eye level from a distance of about four hundred feet. it was a solid rectangle.  the color was silver or metallic and there were no lights.   it was flying at a height of two to three hundred feet in the air which is about half way up the duluth hillside.  

the next two days i searched you tube for rectangular ufos and came across one that was very similar filmed the day before.  it was filmed in daylight from a car window while driving.  the passenger was filming from his window and the rectangle object was going with traffic to the side about 500 feet or so high.  it remained a rectangle until it changed its path and came in front of the car and went to the drivers side of the car.  now they were filming from the front window looking up to the left.  at this point from under the ufo it was no longer rectangular, it was a tear drop shape from the bottom view.  

i believe this to be what i seen in duluth.  a rectangular shape from the sides and a tear drop shape from the underneath and above.
content.summary: 1000ft+ tear drop ufo

content.detailedDescription: My family was celebrating my granddaughters birthday on august 20, 2011, when her father, called us outside to witness a sphere shaped object in the sky, flying south to north over shirley, new york.  my daughter also saw this object that changed dircetions and went east over the calabro airport then disappeared.  it was gone by the time the rest of us got out there.  at first we thought it might have been an airplane that was on fire, but it just disappeared.  it didn't crash.  we guessed it might have been a hot air balloon, or a chinese latern, but my children kept saying no.  about 5 minutes later, we were again called outside and 10 of us observed a sphere shaped object, looking to us about the size of a tennis ball flying south to north.  it is impossible to say how big this sphere really was, but an airplane had flown over head, after the first sighting and that appeared to be the size of a toy airplane, this object was closer then that plane was.  it appeared to be on fire, changing shape from round to oval, it looked to be almost spinning.  no other shapes were noted around it.  no strings or balloons were attached.  it continued to fly south to north for about 2 minutes then changed directions to east heading over the airport then 20 seconds later it just disappeared. we were all very excited and confused as to what it could have been.  we tried to record it on two cell phones the first only recorded blank sky and the other kept shutting off and would not work at all until after the object disappeared, then it worked fine.  there were plenty of stars in the sky that night and this object was larger and brighter then all of them.  it really appeared to be on fire.
content.summary: At about 8:30 on 8-20-2011, my son observed a shere in the sky flying south to north over shirley new york.  he called 10 of my family members outside to see it. it disappeares then another shere came about 5 minutes later and did the same pattern.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were heading north on the veterans express way. the international airport was close by. we passed exit 4 or so before the toll both. we saw a light up in the skye that was heading along the interstate in our direction. it was  bright white light that looked pretty low to be flying where it was. (the airport was a few miles back). as we got closer, it descended lower along the highway. we were both very curious as to what it was. once we got closer, to my disbelief it was literally right next the highway. we were going about 60mph and it didn't move! it was just hovering to the right. there was no sound and it was suspended in the air. the only way i could describe it, was shaped similar to a normal airplane but had a long almost crane like appendage coming off the right side of it with a flashing blue light  at the tip. the main lights were yellow and white. it had a bright light on the front. it was metal, silver-ish/gray/black (it was dark outside). it was the wildest thing we have ever seen. even though it was "disk" shaped, and it looked man-made... i've never scene such a large object hover like that, with no noise. almost like it was frozen in time!! i'd like to know if anyone else saw this or reported this. there were plenty of cars on the highway. we headed back on the other side of the highway a half hour later and it was gone.
content.shape: Blimp,   Cigar,   Disc,   Sphere,   Triangle,   Other
content.summary: Less than 100 ft away, huge craft hovering next to the veterans express way  in tampa! tons of cars witnessed this!

content.detailedDescription: Went outside after my son asked if the space shuttle launched.  after i told him that the shuttle had its final launch, he said that he saw 2 airplanes flying side by side.  i went outside to look and saw a bright light traveling east to west on a straight flight path that disappeared in the clouds..  then another one came from the same direction and again disappeared in the clouds.  we witnessed this 7 times.  very strange.  as one disappeared, another appeared traveling very fast out of nowhere.
content.summary: Bradenton sighting

content.detailedDescription:
We were in north dallas and about 11:26 on 8/20/11 (saturday night) saw a ufo heading north northwest, and it seemed to be just under the cloud deck   (unless it was much smaller then it might have been lower), we had it in our range of vision for about a minute and our field of vision was about forty or fifty yards. (from the roof line of the house on one side of the street to the treeline on the opposite side.) it was not a plane, silent as far as we can tell. passing near over head with a single  slightly flickering light (i thought it was more flickery, lit from within, and fire colored.) and there were no running lights. it moved in a steady straight line. at first i thought it was a plane on fire or a balloon because it looked like the center of the light was on fire... but it was dead calm.. my husband is a amateur astronomer and aviation buff. i have logged almost 75 flight hours in small aircraft so we are familiar with the sound levels a small aircraft produce. he was sure there was no visible silhouette of anything like a blimp. (he also said it was going too fast for a blimp.) he said when he first saw it, it was more shaped like a hour glass. to him it looked like the light was filling something with the brightest point being near the top of the hourglass. i just saw a blob.(but i have vision issues. we were near preston rd and beltline rd in north dallas. my husband noticed it as he was buckling our child into the car and looked up as it came over the roof-line of his mother's house. we lost sight of it when it passed the treeline to the north. my husband was confused (like i've never heard him be). i was pretty sure while watching it that it was a hot air balloon until he pointed out there was no wind, and there wasnt. i was calm but excited, and remembered to tell him to get his phone and video it.
my best guess would be a chinese prayer lamp, but it was dead calm and too damn hot, and the clouds were stationary as well. 

colors. (mrs thomas) gold/copper surrounded by white and red, mostly red. (mr thomas) red.
content.summary: Silent red light moving swiftly in a straight line north north west over north dallas

content.detailedDescription: Saw a hovering triangle  that appeared to be an aircraft but did not resemble a commercial airplane.  it was hovering 100 feet above a house while we drove by, it emitted a beam of light from the "engine" and had red and blue lights on the "wings."  when we pulled onto a side street to photograph it, it had vanished.

Was outside and saw a blinking light between the trees. looked closer and saw an object hovering that started out a white light then started to blink in red, green and blue. a red light shot out of it. it moved very slowly to the right taking about 20 minutes where it went behind the trees and we could not see it anymore. it was too far away to record or photograph.
content.summary: Saw unknown object in northwestern sky over springtown

content.detailedDescription:
This is my fist real ufo experience so i'm kind of excited/freaked out.

i just got off work at 9pm est, by the time i got out side and crossed the street to wait at the bus stop 2 mins had passed. i did my normal routine: check to make sure i had bus money, keys and cell phone. then i put my ipod on. while waiting for the bus to come i always look up at the sky to see the stars. we had had a thunderstorm earlier that day so there were some clouds blocking the view. 
i happened to turn and face south (i think) so i was looking at staples and the brick (which are across the street) and about 45-50 degrees about the horizon there was a fireball coloured sphere in the sky. at first i thought it was the red light from an airplane, but then i realized that it was too big a fuzzy to be that. at this point i took out my ear-phones to listen to see if i could hear an engine. the answer is no, i couldn't hear a plane engine or the sound of helicopter blades.
i watched the object, trying to figure out what it was. when i noticed it, it was to the south of my location. it stayed there for a few seconds/minutes then casually (i use casually because it didn't "zip" across the sky nor did it take for ever for it to move) starting moving to my right (west) which took 30s for it to move 1 - 1.5 inches across the sky. after it had moved it stayed in that location for several seconds before changing direction again and moving to my left (north east) and as it moved about 2 - 2.5 inches to the left it also started to rise (not really rise across the sky but more getting smaller as it moved. so it looked like it was getting further away) as it was moving it went behind a cloud and i lost it.

i am not the only one to have seen it tonight. my friend on facebook also mentioned seeing it in point edward (which is a little village town attached to sarnia) and also on twitter under the hashtag sarnia ( #sarnia ) someone stated that a friend saw cars on lakeshore rd pulled over to watch the ufo's.

i hope more people saw it and are able to add to my story.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked like a red airplane light except way bigger and not blinking

content.detailedDescription:
It was around christmas in 1988.  i was working as a truck driver out of san jose, california. we had caught a pretty good days work delivering a load of furniture to a house in grass valley. i drove on the way up there so the other driver was driving on our way back. delivering a load of furniture inside a two-story house is hard work. i was totally exhausted. there wasnt much conversation between me and the other driver. 
soon we were out of sacramento going down i-5. there is not much to see at night there. i could see mount diablo outlined by the last light of the setting sun, or from the lights of oakland. thats all there was to look at so i looked at it.
as it got darker i noticed small planes flying around mount diablo. i only could tell they were small planes from their navigation lights. at first i only saw one or two but after a few minutes it seemed there were six or more all flying around the mountain. i thought maybe they were having an air race of some sort.
as we got even with the mountain i noticed the planes acting strangely. the planes would circle the mountain until they got to the top then they would fly up over the center of the mountain then they would descend in a straight line towards the bottom to start circling the mountain again.
after watching for a few minutes as we were directly even with the mountain i noticed what looked like a dark shadow centered over the mountain. this was a huge dark shadow, it covered much more than the base of the mountain. that would make it anywhere from a half mile to five or six miles long. from my angle i couldn't tell if it was disk shaped or cigar shaped it now appeared the planes were flying up to the bottom of the huge dark cloud or shadow and then hurrying back down away from it. this is what really got my attention of the dark shadow up there. the dark shadow was no longer centered over the mountain. the planes were no longer circling the mountain and then flying up over the center of the mountain. the planes were still making wide circles, flying up to the center of the dark shadow and then descending. the dark shadow was in a line directly west of our truck. it stayed in a line directly west of our truck until we were south of stockton and lathrop. as we drove south this huge dark shadow drifted south with us at about the same speed of 60mph. 
the planes kept going up to the center of this dark shadow until it was maybe ten miles south of mount diablo then fewer planes were going up until there were none, just this dark shadow, drifting south at the same speed as the truck. i got excited as we neared the i-205 cut off. we were going to be headed right for this dark shadow and should pass right under it. as we headed for it my elation turned to consternation when i could no longer discern the dark shadow. did it keep on drifting south or was the bottom of it camouflaged to look like the night sky? i can assure you i dont know. i did know it was strange and going to give me something to think about for a long time.
content.summary: Dark, hovering shadow, one half to 5 miles long.

content.detailedDescription:
Jeremy gragg telling this description,
my dad(rusty) my brother (lee) & i (jeremy) were sitting on the front porch just past dusk, not quite dark, at the above address.  my brother lee, saw it first.  it started as a very bright point of light, orange/red, far away and small.  it looked like the color and brightness of an army flare from a plane or a road flare.  it was wobbling or staggering back and forth, less than a half inch back and forth.  it was heading from the west part of the sky just under the cloud cover, maybe from the bainbridge or nipgen area flying towards our area, which is close to huntington high school. it started out as a small very bright orange/red dot and grew as it came closer.  when it was the size of an asprin, it looked like a fireball. i was trying to figure out my cellphone camera to get a picture.  it wasn't quite over our heads, it paused or seemed to pause in the sky, and then it shot "straight up" without warning or sound, like a rocket on the 4th of july up through the clouds.  it was still bright, we could barely see through the greyness of the cloud cover as it climbed higher and higher. the light went out, like it shot out into space or something, and we thought our sighting was over.  it wasn't over.  it appearently, shut off it's light above the clouds and it must have started to decend in a freefall dive very fast because it came out of the clouds, basicly down the same line it orgionally went up, really fast. it was now just a black dot when it came through the grey clouds, no light at all, just a black disk, no wings, not a helicopter. it swooped down just under the cloud cover.  my brother said, "here it comes". it was flying straight towards us getting bigger and bigger. i thought it malfunctioned and that's why the lights were out. i thought it was going to crash on the highway in front of us.  without thinking, i started running towards the back yard to avoid the crash.  lee yelled, "hold on jeremy, it's leveling out, come back".  i stopped looked up. it did level out.  we all watched it fly over our heads, traveling an east/northeast straight line towards maple grove road/route 50 area. it was flying as fast as a low flying fighter jet. which we do see and hear alot around here. we watched until it got smaller in the distance. it finally went past the hills out of our view.  it wasn't to far below the clouds when it leveled out. it was the size of a dime as it went over us. it was a black disk shaped object. no lights.  no features were observed & there was never any sound during any of the sighting. right over our heads, it was not a plane.  i asked my dad what he thought, he said, "i'll have to think about this one for awhile".  lee agreed. we were all shocked.......
content.summary: 3 witnesses:  rusty, lee & jeremy gragg

content.detailedDescription:
Jeremy gragg telling this description,
my dad(rusty) my brother (lee) & i (jeremy) were sitting on the front porch just past dusk, not quite dark, at the above address.  my brother lee, saw it first.  it started as a very bright point of light, orange/red, far away and small.  it looked like the color and brightness of an army flare from a plane or a road flare.  it was wobbling or staggering back and forth, less than a half inch back and forth.  it was heading from the west part of the sky just under the cloud cover, maybe from the bainbridge or nipgen area flying towards our area, which is close to huntington high school. it started out as a small very bright orange/red dot and grew as it came closer.  when it was the size of an asprin, it looked like a fireball. i was trying to figure out my cellphone camera to get a picture.  it wasn't quite over our heads, it paused or seemed to pause in the sky, and then it shot "straight up" without warning or sound, like a rocket on the 4th of july up through the clouds.  it was still bright, we could barely see through the greyness of the cloud cover as it climbed higher and higher. the light went out, like it shot out into space or something, and we thought our sighting was over.  it wasn't over.  it appearently, shut off it's light above the clouds and it must have started to decend in a freefall dive very fast because it came out of the clouds, basicly down the same line it orgionally went up, really fast. it was now just a black dot when it came through the grey clouds, no light at all, just a black disk, no wings, not a helicopter. it swooped down just under the cloud cover.  my brother said, "here it comes". it was flying straight towards us getting bigger and bigger. i thought it malfunctioned and that's why the lights were out. i thought it was going to crash on the highway in front of us.  without thinking, i started running towards the back yard to avoid the crash.  lee yelled, "hold on jeremy, it's leveling out, come back".  i stopped looked up. it did level out.  we all watched it fly over our heads, traveling an east/northeast straight line towards maple grove road/route 50 area. it was flying as fast as a low flying fighter jet. which we do see and hear alot around here. we watched until it got smaller in the distance. it finally went past the hills out of our view.  it wasn't to far below the clouds when it leveled out. it was the size of a dime as it went over us. it was a black disk shaped object. no lights.  no features were observed & there was never any sound during any of the sighting. right over our heads, it was not a plane.  i asked my dad what he thought, he said, "i'll have to think about this one for awhile".  lee agreed. we were all shocked.......
content.summary: 3 witnesses:  rusty, lee & jeremy gragg

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on south deck with night vision and watched disks about a mile in the air. moving ,hovering, and disapearing. then i was lloking to east tree and the disk abject came from behind tree almost vertical and moved back and forth leaving a trail of movement. it was so close and very big and very distinctive. scared the crap out of me. fell out of my chair i was so stunned. then watched them for another 20 min. approximately. then came in. i need some night vision recorders. asap. but i can not afford it right now. but any one is welcome to come over and see this. expecially if you have night vision recorder. i must be in a hot spot or they know i'm watching them. last night i beleived i was seing them too but alot of the times it can be a bug in the air and they seem to be round because of the reflection off of them. but when they come very, and i mean very close it is most obvious and frightning too say the least. i cant explain any further. wow! night vision recorder owners welcome. e-mail me at if (e-mail moved to fi field)cms 08/21/11 06:19 flg interested. would appreciate the help .
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Watch disk shaped object appear from behind east tree and moved eratically closest ive seen it since the last 2 times

content.detailedDescription: At 9pm on saturday august 20,2011,i looked out my front door and noticed a vehicle with its headlights on parked at the corner of our road.I went outside and saw a man and woman standing by their vehicle looking up at the sky.  my wife and i both looked up and we all saw about 15 orange, glowing lights.  most were in a triangular formation, headed in a northeasterly direction. the sky was very cloudy and dark, as it had been storming earlier.  we watched them for approximatley 5 minutes;  they were moving very slowly.  they disappeared into the clouds.  we know these could not have been ordinary aircraft, as they were grouped closely together.  the other people were as confused as we were.  the lady said she thought she was seeing things at first.  they were going down decker road when they first saw them.  they then turned at our corner, which is about a quarter mile from decker rd.  we all watched in disbelief until the lights faded into the clouds.
content.summary: We saw approximately 15 orange glowing lights .Most were in a triangular formation.All were traveling in a northeasterly direction.

content.summary: We saw approximately 15 orange glowing lights .Most were in a triangular formation.All were traveling in a northeasterly direction.

content.detailedDescription: Me my wife and nephew go out side every night before bed. beginning in the middle of july we started noticing stars that would just take off at a high rate of speed and swap locations in the sky. some would vanish and some would just move around in different directions. we see about 10 to 15 of these a night. it is august 20th now and we are still seeing them. we have no camera that is clear enough to veiw these objects let alone capture any. they seem to be getting more and more friendly and showing up everynight. couple days back we saw a football sized craft fly right over our heads making little to no noise. it wasn't even flying fast enough to stay in the air but it did. we just want to know what these are and why they are picking my back yard to play with.
content.summary: Star like objects plus really large craft

content.detailedDescription: Me my wife and nephew go out side every night before bed. beginning in the middle of july we started noticing stars that would just take off at a high rate of speed and swap locations in the sky. some would vanish and some would just move around in different directions. we see about 10 to 15 of these a night. it is august 20th now and we are still seeing them. we have no camera that is clear enough to veiw these objects let alone capture any. they seem to be getting more and more friendly and showing up everynight. couple days back we saw a football sized craft fly right over our heads making little to no noise. it wasn't even flying fast enough to stay in the air but it did. we just want to know what these are and why they are picking my back yard to play with.

content.detailedDescription:
My sister and i were at the airport waiting for a fireworks display to begin after an airshow. there was a considerable delay (30-40 minutes) between the end of the airshow and the begining of the fireworks. we were looking at stars and someone noticed what appeared to be a satellite traveling from roughly south west to north east. my sister had never seen a satellite go over before and commented about how fast it appeared to be moving. i am a pilot, i have seen many of them and was explaining how objects need to travel in order to remain in low earth orbit. the object suddenly started to change its direction of travel in what appeared to be very controlled but impossible maneuvers. i couldn't believe what i was seeing and at almost the same moment my sister said "do you see that?!" i was saying "my god i can't believe it!" for the next minute or two we watched this thing stop its forward motion, move in several complete circles, move forward again making "s" turns and finally return to its original direction of travel and eventually out of sight. 
 i'm a pilot, i have been a follower of space flight since it began and a back yard astronomer. i can tell the difference between a satellite, an airplane and a meteor. what we clearly saw did not fit any of them.
content.summary: We observed a lighted object very high in the clear nite sky that went from straight line of travel to very eratic changes in direstion, brief color change, back to original direction and eventually out of sight.
